thread.title: ‘Little People’ Love! Matt Roloff Reveals New Girlfriend After Ex Amy Moves On
thread.title_full: ‘Little People’ Love! Matt Roloff Reveals New Girlfriend After Ex Amy Moves On

author: Gina Bacchiocchi
title: ‘Little People’ Love! Matt Roloff Reveals New Girlfriend After Ex Amy Moves On
text:
It’s been nearly a year since reality TV parents Matt and Amy Roloff finalized their divorce — and now both stars have moved on to new romances!
While Amy, 52, has been dating Portland, Oregon, real estate broker Chris Marek , 54, for more than six months, her ex-husband is now going public with his own love .
Yesterday, the father of four, 55, posted a photo of his new girlfriend, longtime family farm manager Caryn .
PHOTOS:Cheating Scandal? Matt Roloff Admitted He Didn’t Make Commitment A Priority 
“Broke away for a day of relaxing at the beautiful Oregon coast,” Matt captioned the sweet shot. “Is anybody else doing something special this spring break?”

When a fan asked if they were in fact together, Matt confirmed the speculation.
“Yes. Caryn and I are now dating,” he wrote. “It’s very exciting [for] such a wonderful person [to] be a positive companion in my life.”
PHOTOS: ‘Little People,’ Big Feud! Rebel Son Jacob Roloff’s 10 Biggest Disses To His Family 
The couple even hosted a co-ed baby shower for his 26-year-old son, Zach , and his wife Tori last week. (The married pair is expecting a boy in May.)

As RadarOnline.com previously reported, Amy and Chris began dating after being introduced by friends last year.
“It’s been fun! Amy and I are getting along great,” the 54-year-old former bachelor told Radar in an exclusive interview.
Do you approve of Matt’s new woman? Sound off in the comments. 
We pay for juicy info! Do you have a story for RadarOnline.com? Email us at tips@radaronline.com, or call us at (866) ON-RADAR (667-2327) any time, day or night.
